xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: batchimport.import.overwrite.title=Data deduplication and overwrite batchimport.import.overwrite.deduplication.explanation=If by any chance, the column chose for document name does not contain unique names, what should happen to the **duplicate rows**? batchimport.import.overwrite.deduplication.option.skip=Ignore batchimport.import.overwrite.deduplication.option.update=Update: use the data as part of the other rows with the same document name (if the same column is set on multiple rows, the last one will win). batchimport.import.overwrite.deduplication.option.generate_new=Generate a new document name, by adding a number at the end of the document name batchimport.import.overwrite.explanation=If then, for the document name built as indicated above, a document already exists in the wiki with that name, what should we to the **existing document in the wiki**? batchimport.import.overwrite.option.skip=Leave unchanged (ignore data from the file) batchimport.import.overwrite.option.update=Update with the data coming from the file (the fields mapped on the columns of the file will be updated, the rest will remain unchanged) batchimport.import.overwrite.option.replace=Replace with the data coming from the file (the existing document will be deleted and a new one will be created instead, containing only the data in the file) batchimport.import.overwrite.option.generate_new=Generate a new document name, by adding a number at the end of the document name built as indicated above. Note that 2 subsequent imports with this option checked will not yield the same results since the document names used depend on the documents existing on the wiki.
